attributes.action: Eurovision allow UK city holding it temporary permission to change name to Kyiv.
attributes.additional_details: It will give the event more a feel that it is Ukraine’s event and we are rightly caretaking. I can think of no better way to show solidarity through unity.
attributes.background: Grant special temporary permission for whichever hosting city holding the Eurovision to change it's name to Kyiv for the duration of the event.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  This would be a decision for the relevant local authority.
